price: 86. Ir atleisk mano tėvui, iš tiesų, jis yra paklydęs.
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
